title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 163.2 - Climbing upon bridges and other structures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 163.2 - Climbing upon bridges and other structures

State Regulations

No unauthorized person shall climb upon any bridge, culvert
or other structure under the jurisdiction of the Department of

Transportation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
163.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
